title: Vicious Savage
description: Killian and Kai Pierce are the rulers of Blackcrown High. They're ruthless, conniving, and unrelenting bullies. They're the leaders of the town's most feared gang, The Blackcrown Vipers.Ava was the only one Killian trusted, and she betrayed him.Desiree belongs to the enemy, and Kai will use her to get his revenge.The Pierce brothers always get what they want.And they want Ava and Desiree to pay for their mistakes.Trigger warning: This book is a dark romance. It includes strong violence, domestic violence and abuse, explicit sex scenes, dub con, non con, among other things. 18+
author: Blaire Wynters
